typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		etltime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'lake',
	folderPath: 'customerdeltaautomap') ~> source1
source1 filter(etltime >= toTimestamp('20210611', 'yyyymmdd')) ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(Count = count()) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'lake',
	folderPath: 'customer',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
